basics.name: Rahul Saxena
basics.label: SWE/ML Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Computer Science graduate student at UMass Amherst, with experience in software engineering and machine learning, actively seeking full-time Software Engineering (SWE) or Machine Learning Engineering (MLE) opportunities to apply my skills in developing innovative solutions.
